caller_intent: Kathy is seeking clarification about an overdue AutoDraft bill from Ascend, questioning why it was not paid automatically and confirming the amount due.
resolution_steps: Jeff confirms the bill was generated by adding Kathy as an employee to the Mesa garage policy through the Ascend platform.
Jeff explains the $269.57 annual premium charge and verifies the amount with Kathy.
Jeff directs Kathy to make the payment through the Ascend agency bill platform.
Jeff notes that a separate Progressive policy payment schedule is being reviewed.
knowledge_required: Knowledge of Ascend agency bill platform
Ability to interpret insurance policy add-ons (e.g., employee coverage)
Familiarity with Progressive policy payment structures
summary: Kathy contacted Jeff to resolve confusion about an overdue AutoDraft bill from Ascend. Jeff clarified the charge was for adding her as an employee to the garage policy and confirmed the $269.57 payment. He also reviewed her Progressive policy payment schedule. The call concluded with Kathy agreeing to pay the Ascend bill and further discussion planned for the Progressive policy.
